help-file.title: "ORDER FOLLOWERS"
help-file.content:
Syntax: order <petname> <command> order followers <command>
The "order" command is used in two seperate ways. Classes that have the ability to charm mobs must "order" the "pet" to do what the player wants.
Example: order wolf kill duck
To order multiple followers use the command "order followers"
Example: order followers kill duck
The second type of "order" command is used by players that have purchased a ship. For more information on how the "order" command applies to ships, see "help ships."
